title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 78.1 - Professional study of massage therapy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 78.1 - Professional study of massage therapy

State Regulations

To meet the professional educational requirement for
admission to the licensing examination, the applicant shall present evidence
of: (a) high school graduation or its
equivalent; and
(b) completion of a
massage therapy program registered by the department pursuant to Part 52 of
this Title or determined by the department to be equivalent in scope and
content to a registered program; and
(c) applicants who graduated from a
registered program of massage therapy or its equivalent more than three years
before licensure shall present satisfactory evidence of having a current
certificate in cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
78.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
